Name: Elemental Power
Description:
Bound Spell, Power Level 3. Elemental Power is an augment/conveyance spell with a
range of 24" that targets Fenbeasts, Fenhulks and Viridian Lords. The target immediately regains D3 Wounds
worth of models lost earlier during the battle up to their starting value. Alternatively, the target may choose to
make a normal move as if it were the Remaining Moves sub-phase.
